LanguageData.Muffalo.label: muffalo
LanguageData.Muffalo.description: A muffalo is a large herding herbivore that descended from 버팔로 and has adapted to some exotic environments. It is peaceful unless disturbed.
LanguageData.Gazelle.label: gazelle
LanguageData.Gazelle.description: A small, extremely quick antelope known for its amazingly long leap.
LanguageData.Iguana.label: iguana
LanguageData.Iguana.description: An Iguana is a large lizard that normally feeds on plant matter. However when angered, their tough hide and sharp 발톱 can craft them quite dangerous.
LanguageData.Rhinoceros.label: 코뿔소ceros
LanguageData.Rhinoceros.description: A 코뿔소ceros is a large land mammal with a horn on its nose. While it is typically quite peaceful, it will not hesitate to charge with its horn to fend off trespassers.
LanguageData.Dromedary.label: dromedary
LanguageData.Dromedary.description: A dromedary or camel is a distant cousin to 말s that has adapted to survive in harsh desert climates. It has a distinctive hump in the middle of its back. It can go several days without food and water by regulating its internal temperature to avoid perspiring in hot temperatures.
LanguageData.Buffalo.label: 버팔로
LanguageData.Buffalo.description: A 버팔로 is a larger variation of muffalo that has survived the harsh landscape of a rimworld. They are known for their thick, brown wool, and the male's distinguished frontal tusks. They can be somewhat aggressive if you get too close.
LanguageData.Rimram.label: 산양
LanguageData.Rimram.description: The thick wool on these rams makes them very common sight in cold climates. They are known for their ability to climb nearly vertical, sheer cliff faces. They have no fear of falling.
